mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,IFNULL(t2.`STATUS`,'2') checked,IFNULL(t3.collectCount,0) collectCount FROM ( SELECT *FROM t_t_favorites c1 WHERE c1.UID=#{dto.uid} and c1.`STATUS`='1') t1 LEFT JOIN t_w_collect t2 ON t1.id =t2.fid and t2.wid=#{dto.wid} LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.fid ,count(*) collectCount FROM t_t_collect c WHERE c.uid=#{dto.uid} and c.STATUS='1'GROUP BY c.fid) t3 ON t1.id=t3.fid
